name: Feltipern Trevagg's Stun Rifle (V)
Lore: 'Assault rifle modified by Feltipern. Used by the Gotal bounty hunter before he became a tax collector. Occasionally brought along to ''ease'' Feltipern''s collection duties.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on your bounty hunter (free on Feltipern Trevagg). May target a character for free. Draw destiny. Target captured (and you may take one Interrupt from Lost Pile into hand) if destiny +2 > defense value.',
